alert.note: Alert for Central Chelan County; Western Okanogan County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 29 at 3:48AM PST until December 30 at 11:00AM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 11 AM PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 5 inches. Along Highway 2 snow accumulations 4 to 7 inches expected. Above 3500 feet accumulations of 6 to 12 inches, especially in Chelan county. * WHERE...Mazama, Loup Loup Pass, Methow, Conconully, Twisp, Winthrop, Plain, and Leavenworth. * WHEN...From 10 AM this morning to 11 AM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday evening and Friday morning commutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Light snow will start late Thursday morning with minor accumulations. The better accumulations will come overnight through Friday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Central Chelan County; Western Okanogan County
